item.title: Report E-2025050523
item.description:
Report E-2025050523

Identified by scraper @ 2025-06-22T01:13:25+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-05-27
  • City: SPARKS
  • State: NV
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: R & L CARRIERS, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 5000
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On May 27, 2025, one (1) 330-gallon tote of UN2735 was punctured and released approximately one (1) ounce of product to the dock floor. R+L Carriers retained Cura Emergency Services, LC who dispatched a crew from GrayMar Environmental Services (GES) to remediate the impacted site. The crew patched the damaged tote, then utilized citric acid and absorbent pads to remediate the dock floor. All impacted materials were neutralized and containerized in one (1) 5-gallon pail for disposal.
